xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 4 Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika » 4.5 Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 4.5.1 Akusalapada » 4.5.1.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Āsavagocchaka, Kusalattika
Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
46.
1675Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
47.
1676Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava…pe…  upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1677Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1678Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1679Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1680(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1681Āsavaāsavasampayuttadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
